allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Aim High Electrical landing page

Complete single-page landing site for Aim High Electrical Services \(Aurora, CO\).
Includes hero, pain points, 9 services, testimonials, about, process, FAQ,
and CTA sections. Built with brand colors \(#046bd2\), responsive design,
and optimized for Vercel deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add project workspace structure, research docs, and agent definitions

Includes admin docs, discovery research, brand guidelines, content copy,
design wireframes, and Claude agent team configuration for Aim High Electrical.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
